attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: as i and many other people know, when it is time to renew your car tax you are Penilised for your age, unless you are 25 or over car insurance is very expensive. it should be based on how long you have been driving, not how old you are.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
